scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -m "chore(release): bump version to %s" && git push --follow-tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor -m "chore(release): bump version to %s" && git push --follow-tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major -m "chore(release): bump version to %s" && git push --follow-tags
scripts.version:prerelease: npm version prerelease --preid=alpha -m "chore(release): bump version to %s" && git push --follow-tags
